climatePledgeFriendly.details: Cradle to Cradle Certified products are made with safer materials and responsible processes to positively impact people and our planet. SILVER ACHIEVEMENT LEVEL

features: Moisturizing Conditioner: A goddess is strong, her hair should be too. Carol's Daughter Fortifying Sulfate Free Conditioner helps target weak hair, restoring intense moisture and strengthening hair so each strand is stronger from root to tip

Fortifying Formula: Our conditioner for curly hair is blended with Castor Oil, Black Cumin Seed Oil and Ginger. Restores intense moisture and fortifies hair. Hair is easier to detangle, so there is less breakage and hair can maintain length

For Weak, Breakage-Prone Hair: Anti hair breakage products support hair's strength as it grows & gets longer. Delivers 15x stronger hair and 94% less breakage in 1 use with system of shampoo, conditioner, oil & leave in cream vs. non-conditioning shampoo

For Best Use: Direction for use: After using Goddess Strength shampoo, work conditioner thoroughly into wet hair. Massage gently into your scalp and hair, especially the ends. Rinse well. To use as a mask, leave on for 5 to 7 minutes and rinse well

Black Woman Founded: Lisa Price founded Carol's Daughter in her Brooklyn kitchen in 1993. She created this collection of hair products to help natural hair regain its natural balance of moisture, manageability, shine and softness
body.description: Don't let weak hair Hold you back. Give your hair goddess-like strength with our Goddess strength system that supports the strength of your hair as it gets longer. Our powerful conditioning Balm, blended with castor oil, Black Cumin Seed and ginger, when used with our shampoo, Hair & Scalp oil and leave-in cream, helps target weak strands, restoring intense moisture and fortifying hair so each strand is stronger from root to tip. With improved manageability, hair is easier to detangle, so there's less breakage and hair can keep its length. With System of shampoo, conditioner, oil & leave in cream vs. Non-conditioning shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This Conditioner is Awesome!Its perfect for deep conditioning and smells fantastic.Your hair is fully moisturized and left very soft .I have been using it for over 2 years

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite conditioner
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner is a nice creamy consistency, and it keeps my thick, curly hair feeling soft and moisturized. Also, no harsh scents!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good for my curly hair
reviews.reviewText: Really great stuff, my only complaint is it doesn’t last as long as you’d like it to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: if i could marry this conditioner, i would without hesitation. love it to death. does absolute wonders for mine (3b) & my daughters hair (3c/4a). smells fantastic, thick but not heavy consistency, makes detangling quick & moisturizes, also makes our hair super duper soft. adoreeee it and recommend for anyone with curly hair

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My Hair is Young Again!
reviews.reviewText: A few things: I don’t know about reducing breakage because I only began using this product this week so that remains to be seen. The strong perfume smell did take me by surprise, and I admit I didn’t look at the ingredients list until my first use and realizing the perfume-y scent from this was so strong (I work in health care, and don’t wear perfume-y stuff because of my patients). Also, I have a lot of long, thick hair, but it is very prone to breakage. Buuuut, upon applying this conditioner, it was so thick and luxurious, and I was able to comb through my wet hair in the shower incredibly easy with little product, I honestly could not believe it. I have never used a product that could detangle my hair with such ease unless I globbed it on.MY HAIR ACTS YOUNG AGAIN, if that makes any sense. It has the body and bounce it had when I was in my early 20s. I’m in my mid 30s now and have been disappointed in the change in my hair over time. This product literally changed my hair back to its golden days in one use!Yes, I’m giving it 4 stars, but this is because the perfume smell is so strong and unnecessary, and yes, it’s one of the first ingredients, which I really feel takes away from the quality of this product. Nothing but actual perfume needs to smell this strong, so I hope the makers of this product consider at least toning it down. But also I want to tell the makers THANK YOU for making this stuff! I could cry having my old hair back, I’m so grateful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST! CONDITIONER! EVER!!!
reviews.reviewText: I swear I’ve been trying to find the perfect shampoo/conditioner line for my whole adult life. At 38, I’ve finally found something that makes my wild, corse and curly hair completely smooth and manageable. It’s a miracle product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love the Carol's Daughter Goddess Strength Fortifying Shampoo and Conditioner
reviews.reviewText: This products is the best I have used for my hair. I actually have straight hair and I use this product. This was given to me from a friend who can be sensitive to scents. My hair was brittle, lifeless and breaking prior to using the product. I think my hair is feelings better than it has in months. I ran out of the conditioner and was using Biology and my hair started feeling dry and brittle again. So I ordered this again and have decided that I will not be without this shampoo and conditioner ever again. The scent is a very mild scent. I can be sensitive to scents (especially if they are floral) but this shampoo and conditioner doesn't bother me at all. I love the smell of the shampoo and condition and I love how they leave my hair feeling when I use them. This is my favorite shampoo and conditioner so far. TRUST me..... I am over 50 and I have tried several brands and kinds of shampoos and conditioners. Both from professional salons and off the shelf. This is by far my favorite.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I will not use another brand after this. Works perfectly on my chronically dry wavy / curly hair and smells incredible. So so happy I found this brand. I use the shampoo and conditioner and the hair oil and my hair has never looked better. So soft and smells amazing, with actual curls.
This product works great for all types of hair, and leaves my hair soft. It smells wonderful & I would buy it again.

L’après shampoing est parfait, il démêle instantanément mes boucles (3c) tout en ne les alourdissant pas, car ils sont finsLa seule chose qui a la limite, est dommage c’est l’odeur, que je ne trouve pas spécialement agréable, mais sinon c’est un sans faute, je rachèterai c’est sûr!

Nachdem ich nur Positives über diese Spülung gehört habe, habe ich sie mir bestellt. Am Anfang hatte ich auch einen guten Eindruck, aber nach ein paar haarwäschen hab ich gemerkt, dass ich zu viele Erwartungen hatte. Das Produkt riecht scheußlich in den Haaren. Sie macht die Haare zwar weich, jedoch bringt mir das nichts, wenn meine Haare danach stinken. Nachdem man geduscht hat, wenn man sich ja schließlich frisch fühlen.
This conditioner is thick, smells nice, and makes my hair feel soft. I have curly and course hair but this makes it soft and easy to manage. It also helps to detangle.
I have 3B/3C curls and it works so well with my hair. I started buying other products from this brand and have not been disappointed yet
